divs: Sighting Detailsi was watching by the window, and i saw first a normal airplane, and after i turn my head to the left(west) i saw thoses 5 flying discs, in a triangular organisation, the three behind was completly white, and the two in the front was tw red, red like a glowing lava balls, hot like metal in fusion. I was so stressed i call my fridn Alex, to tell him what i was watching before the phone close. The most incredible was the speed, very very slow, like if he want to being seen...
trends: There have been no other sightings in Jette
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: 5 flying discs, 3 white and two red in a triangular shape
